typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		comments as string,
		date_created as timestamp,
		date_released as timestamp,
		engineer as string,
		favorites as string,
		id as string,
		information as string,
		listens as string,
		producer as string,
		tags as string,
		title as string,
		tracks as string,
		type as string,
		active_year_begin as timestamp,
		active_year_end as timestamp,
		associated_labels as string,
		bio as string,
		comments1 as string,
		date_created1 as timestamp,
		favorites1 as string,
		id1 as string,
		latitude as string,
		location as string,
		longitude as string,
		members as string,
		name as string,
		related_projects as string,
		tags1 as string,
		website as string,
		wikipedia_page as string,
		split as string,
		subset as string,
		bit_rate as string,
		comments2 as string,
		composer as string,
		date_created2 as timestamp,
		date_recorded as timestamp,
		duration as string,
		favorites2 as string,
		genre_top as string,
		genres as string,
		genres_all as string,
		information1 as string,
		interest as string,
		language_code as string,
		license as string,
		listens1 as string,
		lyricist as string,
		number as string,
		publisher as string,
		tags2 as string,
		title1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> tracks
source(output(
		genre_id as string,
		tracks as string,
		parent as string,
		title as string,
		top_level as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> genres
tracks, genres join(genre_top == genres@title,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
